column4: Is there any way I can determine what caused my system to crash (hard lock)?
which ones, specifically? I glanced through them, could not find anything useful.
if the kernel crashed it might have left a dump
it is kind of hard to track stuff down ... you have to go back to when the crash happened and see what the last few messages were
idk ... bios upgrade ... ripping out my usb drives from my lappy ... kernel upgrade ? i have no idea any more
Oddly enough, I have no /var/log/messages file
you do have logs in there though righ t?
anyone know how i can get my bios version from terminal ?
Better yet: dmidecode | grep Version | head -1
